column4: Figured out that ubuntu picks up my wireless card, which is Atheros AR8132.
what have you done to see that it is picked up but not working?
so, does it work?  can you connect?

No, I can't connect. When I unplugged my ethernet cord my wireless card wouldn't connect to my home connection. I even created a wireless connection to use when it works, it wouldn't connect. My router is up and running. Dunno what's wrong.
is this a fresh install?  what version?
yeah, but i don't know.  Im playing with that testing app you pointed out.  Have you tried configuring your card through network manager?
Network Manager? Do you mean Network Connections?
there should be a small icon on the top right bar of your screen
also, you can try: iwconfig     and sudo iwlist <IFACE> scanning
but yeah, try the app first
Got no wireless extensions for both of em.
